sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE, MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE_NM, REG_USR, TO_CHAR(REGIST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REGIST_DT, UPD_USR, TO_CHAR(UPDT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDT_DT FROM MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE_F WHERE 1=1
AND MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE LIKE '%' || #sMngFeeFcltySe# || '%'
AND MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE_NM LIKE '%' || #sMngFeeFcltySeNm# || '%'
ORDER BY REGIST_DT ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE_F WHERE 1=1
AND MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE LIKE '%' || #sMngFeeFcltySe# || '%'
AND MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE_NM LIKE '%' || #sMngFeeFcltySeNm# || '%'
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE_F ( MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE, MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE_NM, REG_USR, REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #mngFeeFcltySe#, #mngFeeFcltySeNm#, #regUsr#, sysdate )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE_F SET MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE_NM = #mngFeeFcltySeNm# ,UPD_USR = #updUsr# ,UPDT_DT = sysdate WHERE MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE = #mngFeeFcltySe#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(1) checkSeCnt FROM MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE_F WHERE MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE = #checkSeCnt#
